00054 //Change this number when we want any who gets the new build to reset the options
00055 #define                       GAME_SETTING_CURRENT_VERSION        522
00056 
00057 
00058 
00059 BOOLEAN LoadGameSettings()
00060 {
00061       HWFILE      hFile;
00062       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead;
00063 
00064 
00065       //if the game settings file does NOT exist, or if it is smaller then what it should be
00066       if( !FileExists( GAME_SETTINGS_FILE ) || FileSize( GAME_SETTINGS_FILE ) != sizeof( GAME_SETTINGS ) )
00067       {
00068             //Initialize the settings
00069             InitGameSettings();
00070 
00071             //delete the shade tables aswell
00072             DeleteShadeTableDir( );
00073       }
00074       else
00075       {
00076             hFile = FileOpen( GAME_SETTINGS_FILE, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE );
00077             if( !hFile )
00078             {
00079                   FileClose( hFile );
00080                   InitGameSettings();
00081                   return(FALSE);
00082             }
00083 
00084             FileRead( hFile, &gGameSettings, sizeof( GAME_SETTINGS ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00085             if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( GAME_SETTINGS ) )
00086             {
00087                   FileClose( hFile );
00088                   InitGameSettings();
00089                   return(FALSE);
00090             }
00091 
00092             FileClose( hFile );
00093       }
00094 
00095 
00096       //if the version in the game setting file is older then the we want, init the game settings
00097       if( gGameSettings.uiSettingsVersionNumber < GAME_SETTING_CURRENT_VERSION )
00098       {
00099             //Initialize the settings
00100             InitGameSettings();
00101 
00102             //delete the shade tables aswell
00103             DeleteShadeTableDir( );
00104 
00105             return( TRUE );
00106       }
00107 
00108 
00109       //
00110       //Do checking to make sure the settings are valid
00111       //
00112       if( gGameSettings.bLastSavedGameSlot < 0 || gGameSettings.bLastSavedGameSlot >= NUM_SAVE_GAMES ) 
00113             gGameSettings.bLastSavedGameSlot = -1;
00114 
00115       if( gGameSettings.ubMusicVolumeSetting > HIGHVOLUME )
00116             gGameSettings.ubMusicVolumeSetting = MIDVOLUME;
00117       
00118       if( gGameSettings.ubSoundEffectsVolume > HIGHVOLUME )
00119             gGameSettings.ubSoundEffectsVolume = MIDVOLUME;
00120 
00121       if( gGameSettings.ubSpeechVolume > HIGHVOLUME )
00122             gGameSettings.ubSpeechVolume = MIDVOLUME;
00123 
00124 
00125       //make sure that at least subtitles or speech is enabled
00126       if( !gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SUBTITLES ] && !gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SPEECH ] )
00127       {
00128             gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SUBTITLES ]                                   = TRUE;
00129             gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SPEECH ]                                      = TRUE;
00130       }
00131             
00132 
00133       //
00134       //    Set the settings
00135       //
00136 
00137       SetSoundEffectsVolume( gGameSettings.ubSoundEffectsVolume );
00138       SetSpeechVolume( gGameSettings.ubSpeechVolume );
00139       MusicSetVolume( gGameSettings.ubMusicVolumeSetting ); 
00140 
00141 #ifndef BLOOD_N_GORE_ENABLED
00142       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_BLOOD_N_GORE ]                    = FALSE;
00143 #endif
00144 
00145       //if the user doesnt want the help screens present
00146       if( gGameSettings.fHideHelpInAllScreens )
00147       {
00148             gHelpScreen.usHasPlayerSeenHelpScreenInCurrentScreen = 0;
00149       }
00150       else
00151       {
00152             //Set it so that every screens help will come up the first time ( the 'x' will be set )
00153             gHelpScreen.usHasPlayerSeenHelpScreenInCurrentScreen = 0xffff;
00154       }
00155 
00156       return( TRUE );
00157 }
00158 
00159 
00160 BOOLEAN     SaveGameSettings()
00161 {
00162       HWFILE            hFile;
00163       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten;
00164 
00165 
00166 
00167       //create the file
00168       hFile = FileOpen( GAME_SETTINGS_FILE, FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_CREATE_ALWAYS, FALSE );
00169       if( !hFile )
00170       {
00171             FileClose( hFile );
00172             return(FALSE);
00173       }
00174 
00175 
00176 
00177       //Record the current settings into the game settins structure
00178 
00179       gGameSettings.ubSoundEffectsVolume = (UINT8)GetSoundEffectsVolume( );
00180       gGameSettings.ubSpeechVolume = (UINT8)GetSpeechVolume( );
00181       gGameSettings.ubMusicVolumeSetting = (UINT8)MusicGetVolume( );    
00182 
00183       strcpy( gGameSettings.zVersionNumber, czVersionNumber );
00184 
00185       gGameSettings.uiSettingsVersionNumber = GAME_SETTING_CURRENT_VERSION;
00186 
00187       //Write the game settings to disk
00188       FileWrite( hFile, &gGameSettings, sizeof( GAME_SETTINGS ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00189       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( GAME_SETTINGS ) )
00190       {
00191             FileClose( hFile );
00192             return(FALSE);
00193       }
00194 
00195       FileClose( hFile );
00196 
00197       return( TRUE );
00198 }
00199 
00200 void InitGameSettings()
00201 {
00202       memset( &gGameSettings, 0, sizeof( GAME_SETTINGS ) );
00203 
00204       //Init the Game Settings
00205       gGameSettings.bLastSavedGameSlot          = -1;
00206       gGameSettings.ubMusicVolumeSetting  = 63;
00207       gGameSettings.ubSoundEffectsVolume  = 63;
00208       gGameSettings.ubSpeechVolume                    = 63;
00209 
00210       //Set the settings
00211       SetSoundEffectsVolume( gGameSettings.ubSoundEffectsVolume );
00212       SetSpeechVolume( gGameSettings.ubSpeechVolume );
00213       MusicSetVolume( gGameSettings.ubMusicVolumeSetting ); 
00214 
00215       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SUBTITLES ]                                         = TRUE;
00216       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SPEECH ]                                      = TRUE;
00217       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_KEY_ADVANCE_SPEECH ]                    = FALSE;
00218       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_RTCONFIRM ]                                         = FALSE;
00219       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_HIDE_BULLETS ]                                = FALSE;
00220       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_TRACKING_MODE ]                               = TRUE;
00221       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_MUTE_CONFIRMATIONS ]                    = FALSE;
00222       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_ANIMATE_SMOKE ]                               = TRUE;
00223       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_BLOOD_N_GORE ]                                = TRUE;
00224       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_DONT_MOVE_MOUSE ]                             = FALSE;
00225       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_OLD_SELECTION_METHOD ]                        = FALSE;
00226       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_ALWAYS_SHOW_MOVEMENT_PATH ]             = FALSE;
00227 
00228       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SLEEPWAKE_NOTIFICATION ]                = TRUE;
00229 
00230       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_USE_METRIC_SYSTEM ]                           = FALSE;
00231 
00232       #ifndef BLOOD_N_GORE_ENABLED
00233             gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_BLOOD_N_GORE ]                          = FALSE;
00234       #endif
00235 
00236       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_MERC_ALWAYS_LIGHT_UP ]                        = FALSE;
00237       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SMART_CURSOR ]                                = FALSE;
00238 
00239       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SNAP_CURSOR_TO_DOOR ]                   = TRUE;
00240       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_GLOW_ITEMS ]                                  = TRUE;
00241       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_TOGGLE_TREE_TOPS ]                            = TRUE;
00242       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_TOGGLE_WIREFRAME ]                            = TRUE;
00243       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_3D_CURSOR ]                                         = FALSE;
00244       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_CTH_CURSOR ]                                  = TRUE;
00245       //Madd:
00246       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_GL_BURST_CURSOR ]                             = TRUE;
00247       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_DROP_ALL ]                                          = FALSE;
00248       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_GL_HIGH_ANGLE ]                               = FALSE;
00249       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_AIM_LEVEL_RESTRICTION ]                       = TRUE;
00250       // JA2Gold
00251       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_MERC_CASTS_LIGHT ]                            = TRUE;
00252 
00253       //lalien
00254       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SPACE_SELECTS_NEXT_SQUAD ]              = TRUE;
00255       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SHOW_ITEM_SHADOW ]                            = TRUE;
00256       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SHOW_WEAPON_RANGE_IN_TILES ]            = TRUE;
00257       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_TRACERS_FOR_SINGLE_FIRE ]               = FALSE;
00258       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_RAIN_SOUND ]                                  = TRUE;
00259       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_ALLOW_CROWS ]                                 = TRUE;
00260 
00261       gGameSettings.ubSizeOfDisplayCover = 4;
00262       gGameSettings.ubSizeOfLOS = 4;
00263 
00264       //Since we just set the settings, save them
00265       SaveGameSettings();
00266 }

00268 void InitGameOptions()
00269 {
00270       memset( &gGameOptions, 0, sizeof( GAME_OPTIONS ) );
00271 
00272       //Init the game options
00273       gGameOptions.ubBobbyRay             = BR_GOOD;
00274       gGameOptions.fGunNut                = TRUE;
00275       gGameOptions.fAirStrikes            = FALSE;
00276       gGameOptions.ubGameStyle            = STYLE_SCIFI;
00277       gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel      = DIF_LEVEL_MEDIUM;
00278       //gGameOptions.fTurnTimeLimit = FALSE;
00279       
00280       gGameOptions.fIronManMode           = FALSE;
00281 }

00553 
00554 
00555 BOOLEAN GetCDLocation( )
00556 {
00557       UINT32      uiStrngLength = 0;
00558       CHAR8       zCdLocation[ SGPFILENAME_LEN ];
00559       UINT32      uiDriveType=0;
00560       UINT32      uiRetVal=0;
00561 
00562       //Do a crude check to make sure the Ja2.ini file is the right on
00563 
00564       uiRetVal = GetPrivateProfileString( "Ja2 Settings","CD", "", zCdLocation, SGPFILENAME_LEN, GAME_INI_FILE );
00565       if( uiRetVal == 0 || !IsDriveLetterACDromDrive( zCdLocation ) )
00566       {
00567             // the user most likely doesnt have the file, or the user has messed with the file
00568             // build a new one
00569             
00570             //First delete the old file
00571             // Snap: don't clobber the INI file!
00572             //FileDelete( GAME_INI_FILE );
00573 
00574             //Get the location of the cdrom drive
00575             if( GetCDromDriveLetter( zCdLocation ) )
00576             {
00577                   CHAR8       *pTemp;
00578 
00579                   //if it succeeded
00580                   pTemp = strrchr( zCdLocation, ':' );
00581                   pTemp[0] = '\0';
00582             }
00583             else
00584             {
00585                   //put in a default location
00586                   sprintf( zCdLocation, "c" );
00587             }
00588 
00589             //Now create a new file
00590              WritePrivateProfileString( "Ja2 Settings", "CD", zCdLocation, GAME_INI_FILE );
00591 
00592              GetPrivateProfileString( "Ja2 Settings","CD", "", zCdLocation, SGPFILENAME_LEN, GAME_INI_FILE );
00593       }
00594 
00595       uiStrngLength = strlen( zCdLocation );
00596 
00597       //if the string length is less the 1 character, it is a drive letter
00598       if( uiStrngLength == 1 )
00599       {
00600             sprintf( gzCdDirectory, "%s:\\%s", zCdLocation, CD_ROOT_DIR );
00601       }
00602 
00603       //else it is most likely a network location
00604       else if( uiStrngLength > 1 )
00605       {
00606             sprintf( gzCdDirectory, "%s\\%s", zCdLocation, CD_ROOT_DIR );
00607       }
00608       else
00609       {
00610             //no path was entered
00611             gzCdDirectory[ 0 ] = '.';
00612       }
00613 
00614       return( TRUE );
00615 }
00616 
00617 
00618 
00619 BOOLEAN GetCDromDriveLetter( STR8   pString )
00620 {
00621       UINT32      uiSize=0;
00622       UINT8       ubCnt=0;
00623       CHAR8       zDriveLetters[512];
00624       CHAR8       zDriveLetter[16];
00625       UINT32      uiDriveType;
00626 
00627       uiSize = GetLogicalDriveStrings( 512, zDriveLetters );
00628 
00629       for( ubCnt=0;ubCnt<uiSize;ubCnt++ )
00630       {
00631             //if the current char is not null
00632             if( zDriveLetters[ ubCnt ] != '\0' )
00633             {
00634                   //get the string
00635                   zDriveLetter[ 0 ] = zDriveLetters[ ubCnt ];
00636                   ubCnt++;
00637                   zDriveLetter[ 1 ] = zDriveLetters[ ubCnt ];
00638                   ubCnt++;
00639                   zDriveLetter[ 2 ] = zDriveLetters[ ubCnt ];
00640 
00641                   zDriveLetter[ 3 ] = '\0';
00642 
00643                   //Get the drive type
00644                   uiDriveType = GetDriveType( zDriveLetter );
00645                   switch( uiDriveType )
00646                   {
00647                         // The drive is a CD-ROM drive. 
00648                         case DRIVE_CDROM:
00649                               strcpy( pString, zDriveLetter );
00650 
00651                               if ( DoJA2FilesExistsOnDrive( pString ) )
00652                               {
00653                                     return( TRUE );
00654                               }
00655                               break;
00656 
00657                         default:
00658                               break;
00659                   }
00660             }
00661       }
00662 
00663       return( FALSE );
00664 }
00665 
00666 
00667 /*
00668 
00669 
00670       //Determine the type of drive the CDrom is on
00671       uiDriveType = GetDriveType( zCdLocation );
00672       switch( uiDriveType )
00673       {
00674             // The root directory does not exist. 
00675             case DRIVE_NO_ROOT_DIR:
00676                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("CDrom Info '%s': %s", zCdLocation, "The root directory does not exist." ) );
00677                   break;
00678 
00679 
00680             // The disk can be removed from the drive. 
00681             case DRIVE_REMOVABLE:
00682                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("CDrom Info '%s': %s", zCdLocation, "The disk can be removed from the drive." ) );
00683                   break;
00684 
00685 
00686             // The disk cannot be removed from the drive. 
00687             case DRIVE_FIXED:
00688                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("CDrom Info '%s': %s", zCdLocation, "The disk cannot be removed from the drive." ) );
00689                   break;
00690 
00691 
00692             // The drive is a remote (network) drive. 
00693             case DRIVE_REMOTE: 
00694                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("CDrom Info '%s': %s", zCdLocation, "The drive is a remote (network) drive." ) );
00695                   break;
00696 
00697 
00698             // The drive is a CD-ROM drive. 
00699             case DRIVE_CDROM:
00700                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("CDrom Info '%s': %s", zCdLocation, "The drive is a CD-ROM drive." ) );
00701                   break;
00702 
00703 
00704             // The drive is a RAM disk. 
00705             case DRIVE_RAMDISK:
00706                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("CDrom Info '%s': %s", zCdLocation, "The drive is a RAM disk." ) );
00707                   break;
00708 
00709       
00710             // The drive type cannot be determined. 
00711             case DRIVE_UNKNOWN:
00712             default:
00713                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("CDrom Info '%s': %s", zCdLocation, "The drive type cannot be determined." ) );
00714                   break;
00715       }
00716 
00717 
00718 */
00719 
00720 BOOLEAN CheckIfGameCdromIsInCDromDrive()
00721 {
00722       CHAR8       zVolumeNameBuffer[512];
00723       UINT32      uiVolumeSerialNumber=0;
00724       UINT32      uiMaxComponentLength=0;
00725       UINT32      uiFileSystemFlags=0;
00726       CHAR8       zFileSystemNameBuffer[512];
00727       CHAR8       zCdLocation[ SGPFILENAME_LEN ];
00728       CHAR8       zCdFile[ SGPFILENAME_LEN ];
00729 
00730       CHAR8       zCdromRootDrive[512];
00731       BOOLEAN     fFailed = FALSE;
00732       UINT32      uiVolumeReturnValue;
00733       UINT32      uiLastError = ERROR_SUCCESS;
00734 
00735       if( !GetCdromLocationFromIniFile( zCdromRootDrive ) )
00736             return( FALSE );
00737 
00738       uiVolumeReturnValue = GetVolumeInformation( zCdromRootDrive, zVolumeNameBuffer, 512, (LPDWORD) &uiVolumeSerialNumber, (LPDWORD) &uiMaxComponentLength, (LPDWORD) &uiFileSystemFlags, zFileSystemNameBuffer, 512 );
00739 
00740       if( !uiVolumeReturnValue )
00741       {
00742              uiLastError = GetLastError();
00743       }
00744 
00745       // OK, build filename
00746       sprintf( zCdFile, "%s%s", zCdLocation, gCheckFilenames[ Random( 2 ) ] );
00747 
00748             //If the cdrom drive is no longer in the drive
00749       if( uiLastError == ERROR_NOT_READY || ( !FileExists( zCdFile ) ) )
00750       {
00751                   CHAR8 sString[512];
00752 
00753                   //if a game has been started, add the msg about saving the game to a different entry
00754                   if( gTacticalStatus.fHasAGameBeenStarted )
00755                   {
00756                         sprintf( sString, "%S  %S", pMessageStrings[ MSG_INTEGRITY_WARNING ], pMessageStrings[ MSG_CDROM_SAVE_GAME ] );
00757 
00758                         SaveGame( SAVE__ERROR_NUM, pMessageStrings[ MSG_CDROM_SAVE ] );
00759                   }
00760                   else
00761                   {
00762                         sprintf( sString, "%S", pMessageStrings[ MSG_INTEGRITY_WARNING ] );
00763                   }
00764 
00765       // ATE: These are ness. due to reference counting
00766       // in showcursor(). I'm not about to go digging in low level stuff at this
00767       // point in the game development, so keep these here, as this works...
00768       ShowCursor(TRUE);
00769       ShowCursor(TRUE);
00770       ShutdownWithErrorBox( sString );
00771 
00772       //DoTester( );
00773       //MessageBox(NULL, sString, "Error", MB_OK | MB_ICONERROR  );
00774 
00775                   return( FALSE );
00776       }
00777 
00778       return( TRUE );   
00779 }
00780 
00781 
00782 BOOLEAN GetCdromLocationFromIniFile( STR pRootOfCdromDrive )
00783 {
00784       UINT32      uiRetVal=0;
00785 
00786       //Do a crude check to make sure the Ja2.ini file is the right on
00787 
00788       uiRetVal = GetPrivateProfileString( "Ja2 Settings","CD", "", pRootOfCdromDrive, SGPFILENAME_LEN, GAME_INI_FILE );
00789       if( uiRetVal == 0 )
00790       {
00791             pRootOfCdromDrive[0] = '\0';
00792             return( FALSE);
00793       }
00794       else
00795       {
00796             //add the :\ to the dir
00797             strcat( pRootOfCdromDrive, ":\\" );
00798             return( TRUE );
00799       }
00800 }
00801 
00802 
00803 void CDromEjectionErrorMessageBoxCallBack( UINT8 bExitValue )
00804 {
00805       if( bExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_OK )
00806       {
00807             guiPreviousOptionScreen = GAME_SCREEN;
00808 
00809             //if we are in a game, save the game
00810             if( gTacticalStatus.fHasAGameBeenStarted )
00811             {
00812                   SaveGame( SAVE__ERROR_NUM, pMessageStrings[ MSG_CDROM_SAVE ] );
00813             }
00814 
00815             //quit the game
00816             gfProgramIsRunning = FALSE;
00817       }
00818 }
00819 
00820 
00821 BOOLEAN IsDriveLetterACDromDrive( STR pDriveLetter )
00822 {
00823       UINT32      uiDriveType;
00824       CHAR8       zRootName[512];
00825 
00826       sprintf( zRootName, "%s:\\", pDriveLetter );
00827 
00828       //Get the drive type
00829       uiDriveType = GetDriveType( zRootName );
00830       switch( uiDriveType )
00831       {
00832             // The drive is a CD-ROM drive. 
00833 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00834             case DRIVE_NO_ROOT_DIR:
00835             case DRIVE_REMOTE:
00836 #endif
00837             case DRIVE_CDROM:
00838                   return( TRUE );
00839                   break;
00840       }
00841 
00842       return( FALSE );
00843 }
00844 
00845 void DisplayGameSettings( )
00846 {
00847       //Display the version number
00848       ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"%s: %s (%S)", pMessageStrings[ MSG_VERSION ], zVersionLabel, czVersionNumber );
00849 
00850       //Display the difficulty level
00851       ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"%s: %s", gzGIOScreenText[ GIO_DIF_LEVEL_TEXT ], gzGIOScreenText[ gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel + GIO_EASY_TEXT - 1 ] );
00852 
00853       //Bobby Ray option
00854       switch ( gGameOptions.ubBobbyRay )
00855       {
00856             case BR_GOOD:
00857                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"%s: %s", gzGIOScreenText[ GIO_BR_QUALITY_TEXT ], gzGIOScreenText[ GIO_BR_GOOD_TEXT ] );
00858                   break;
00859             case BR_GREAT:
00860                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"%s: %s", gzGIOScreenText[ GIO_BR_QUALITY_TEXT ], gzGIOScreenText[ GIO_BR_GREAT_TEXT ] );
00861                   break;
00862             case BR_EXCELLENT:
00863                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"%s: %s", gzGIOScreenText[ GIO_BR_QUALITY_TEXT ], gzGIOScreenText[ GIO_BR_EXCELLENT_TEXT ] );
00864                   break;
00865             case BR_AWESOME:
00866                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"%s: %s", gzGIOScreenText[ GIO_BR_QUALITY_TEXT ], gzGIOScreenText[ GIO_BR_AWESOME_TEXT ] );
00867                   break;
00868       }
00869 
00870             // Kaiden: Following Line was commented out (Extra Bobby Rays Setting always displays Normal.
00871       //ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"%s: %s", gzGIOScreenText[ GIO_BR_QUALITY_TEXT ], gzGIOScreenText[ GIO_BR_GOOD_TEXT ] );
00872 //    ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"%s: %s", gzGIOScreenText[ GIO_GAME_SAVE_STYLE_TEXT ], gzGIOScreenText[ GIO_SAVE_ANYWHERE_TEXT + gGameOptions.fIronManMode ] );

00886

00892 
00893 BOOLEAN MeanwhileSceneSeen( UINT8 ubMeanwhile )
00894 {
00895       UINT32      uiCheckFlag;
00896 
00897       if ( ubMeanwhile > 32 || ubMeanwhile > NUM_MEANWHILES )
00898       {
00899             return( FALSE );
00900       }
00901 
00902       uiCheckFlag = 0x1 << ubMeanwhile;
00903 
00904       if ( gGameSettings.uiMeanwhileScenesSeenFlags & uiCheckFlag )
00905       {
00906             return( TRUE );
00907       }
00908       else
00909       {
00910             return( FALSE );
00911       }
00912 }
00913 
00914 BOOLEAN SetMeanwhileSceneSeen( UINT8 ubMeanwhile )
00915 {
00916       UINT32      uiCheckFlag;
00917 
00918       if ( ubMeanwhile > 32 || ubMeanwhile > NUM_MEANWHILES )
00919       {
00920             // can't set such a flag!
00921             return( FALSE );
00922       }
00923       uiCheckFlag = 0x1 << ubMeanwhile;
00924       gGameSettings.uiMeanwhileScenesSeenFlags |= uiCheckFlag;
00925       return( TRUE );
00926 }
00927 
00928 BOOLEAN     CanGameBeSaved()
00929 {
00930       //if the iron man mode is on
00931       if( gGameOptions.fIronManMode )
00932       {
00933             //if we are in turn based combat
00934             if( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
00935             {
00936                   //no save for you
00937                   return( FALSE );
00938             }
00939 
00940             //if there are enemies in the current sector
00941             if( gWorldSectorX != -1 && gWorldSectorY != -1 && 
00942                         gWorldSectorX != 0 && gWorldSectorY != 0 && 
00943                         NumEnemiesInAnySector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) > 0 )
00944             {
00945                   //no save for you
00946                   return( FALSE );
00947             }
00948 
00949             //All checks failed, so we can save
00950             return( TRUE );
00951       }
00952       else
00953       {
00954             return( TRUE );
00955       }
00956 }
